title: SAMSUNG 324 L Frost Free Double Door 2 Star Convertible Refrigerator  (Elegant Inox, RT34M5538S8/HL)

product_specification.In The Box:
1 Refrigerator Unit
User Manual
Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo:
Explain all the functionality of the product
Flipkart will facilitate Installation & Demo at time of your convenience from an brand authorized service engineer
Usage of the product
The authorized service engineer will be providing detailed demo that includes
The Installation & Demo service will be provided free of cost. All additional accessories not part of the the package will be charged separately
Preventive maintenance action to be taken
Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years Warranty on Compressor from Samsung
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Easy Slide Shelf: This shelf lets you store, organize and navigate food even at the back or corners of the shelf.

review: Very spacious caters to a family of three very well. Thoughtfully designed especially the crisper box which has been made big though at the cost of space for the water bottle rack at the bottom of the door. Good for vegetarians. The non vegetarian has a huge freezer to be happy with. The flexible fridge freezer idea is good for a young family which travels often. Very good temp control. Tangible since it comes in numerical values rather than the other type which has rotary knobs and indicate only cold and colder. Especially in summers and winters with large temp variations. Go for it. Total Value for money and satisfaction.

superb quality superb cooling
very large space
delivery very well and timely
Great service by flipkart, awesome product, it's great deal, thanks to flipkart, also great support to installation of his engineer Mr. Asif

It is missing light in freezer section and they should have given a bottom bottle guard. even though it is 324 litres I feel it's congested in storage section because of no bottom bottle guard. Mainly they should have given a bottom bottle gaurd for storing water bottles or cool drinks. and upper guard tray is not feasible for storing big bottles because it stops closing door if you put bigger ones. performance wise it's good with its 5 in 1 convertible features.
Good spacious refrigerator. Delivery and Installation was seamless. Took it in exchange offer and got a decent price for the old refrigerator. Using it for last two days...so far so good..

We were sceptical before buying this... But this was a perfect buy...functions are easy to understand. And lot of space available for even big utensils. They can be placed easily. Conversion mode is very handy. Fresh room is available. Color the silver one, is very simple and elegant. Vegetable box is spacious. Very happy with the purchase.

One of the best deals I got on flipkart, got it for 24,000 during big billion sale (without exchange). It was delivered flawlessly (within 3 days) and installation was done on the same day by Samsung technician.
Coming to the features.
Pros :
1. Power rating is very low (it consumes less than half the power of my current Samsung 265 ltrs fridge)
2. Smart convertable feature is very convenient
3. It can run on home inverter system (not tested yet)
4. Enough space for a family of 3 to 4 people
Cons :
1. Only one row for Bottle holder
2. The metallic finish (surface) is fingerprint magnet and is prone to scratches

Smart and sharp design with exciting color "Pebble Blue". Ample space and completely reliant on Samsung's performance since using another one since 2003! Got good deals and offers. Flipkart product assurance and delivery as usual superb. Never failed to impress.

Fantastic features, built quality & stylish look.

This was my second unit to home. I've bought a 345 L and this one was for my wife. I can see a very happy user's :)

Samsung 324 is an awesome refrigerator, bought one at Great India Sale, Elegant Inox, luckily got the fridge
delivered with out any scratches, the only hitch was delivery, Flipkart and its Logistics counterpart eKart never delivered
on time, even the manufacturer Samsung dragged 'installation & demonstration' by 72 hours, saving grace is service engineer
from Samsung, who explained about the fridge in lucid terms, in fact we know the functionality of the refrigerator, as we use
the similar higher end Hitachi in the US!

Very spacious caters to a family of three very well. Thoughtfully designed especially the crisper box which has been made big though at the cost of space for the water bottle rack at the bottom of the door. Good for vegetarians. The non vegetarian has a huge freezer to be happy with. The flexible fridge freezer idea is good for a young family which travels often. Very good temp control. Tangible since it comes in numerical values rather than the other type which has rotary knobs and indicate only cold and colder. Especially in summers and winters with large temp variations. Go for it. Total Value for money and satisfaction.

Very nice product by Samsung and prompt delivery by Flipkart. It’s been a one and half months since our family is using this refrigerator and whole family is happy.
Refrigerator is very specious and converter works so smoothly and makes it and economic efficient. Go for it.

I am using this from last 2 Years and recently I bought for my Home Town Patna. Everything is perfect as if now. I took 3 year additional warranty because of electricity fluctuate in small cities. Overall good experience and thanks to Flipkart. We got a great deal.
Thanks to everyone.

A nice product by Samsung. After using 2 and half year of use, I am writing this review. This product is nice in terms of cooling capacity, internal space, and Power consumption. Overall it's a good product. I got it on 27400 on Flipkart big billion day in 2018.

Appreciate Flipkart for prompt delivery. Mind blowing purchase just got in Rs 27390 by using HDFC CC.
Pros: 1) Large space to keep vegetables.
2) 5 in 1 convertible, LED Lightening, Twin Cooling, Coolpad.
3) No noise, Works on home inverter too.
4) Less power consumption(260 Units).
5) Digital inverter compressor with 10 years warranty.
6) Apr 2018 Manufacturing.

Cons: 1) No door lock, no child lock.
2) Only one bottle guard given but given 2 eggs guard which actually don't need.

Brand matters.. Go for Samsung buy from Flipkart only.

Flipkart immediately responded to my orders on COD and sent refrigerator within 3 days and the technician next day came and attended demo. He is so polite and taught how to operate this version. He is Nagendra good at his work. Now a days the most of the technicians are not attentive and not caring the customer. They demand additional charges and rude to their work as well as towards customer. This technician is good and not asked any penny. The refrigerator is top branded one and it’s working condition is good. But it had no handle and child lock facility. But it is ok for this budget

This Samsung fridge is very decent looking model. It is very durable and has very fast cooling. It comes with in built stabilizer with voltage fluctuation range of 100v to 300v. It has 5 convertible modes and also a vacation model to save power. It is very fast in cooling and ice making. Insides are very spacious and the fresh box is very easy to handle, clean and use. Demo was given by the Samsung engineer and the delivery was amazing from Flipkart. Go for it!

Love this refrigerator. Best in class latest refrigerator from Samsung bought at great price from Flipkart. Flawless delivery and installation experience. The fridge arrived the very next day we ordered. Capacity-wise this fridge is more than enough for our family of 2. Infact when we had guests over, the 5 - coversion modes functionality came in handy.
delivered before the given time , nice packing and nice staf and good demo and worth of money

Very good Product.... Above all features i am very proud that i have purchased "Made in India" product...no more room for chinese products in my home anymore... Coming back.. fridge has ample space for storage, Led lighting, samsung installation and demo was very fast within 45hrs of delivery, Flipkart delivery was awesome delivered fridge in mint condition without any damage... Thank you flipkart for offering this at a competitive price... looking forward for more similar offers from your side
So far so good. Review after 3 days of usage. Very happy, ample space and cooling is good. The guy who had come for demo was nice and courteous, also flexible with timing.

I have ordered the refrigerator on 11.8.2018.and the product sent by FLIPKART on 13.8.2018 perfectly in sealed condition and installation and demo done on same day of delivery.Delivery personnel are very efficient and cooperating, great experience.

It is very spacious and effective and its best qualities is that we can convert freezer in to fridge.It consumes around 3.7 units in 24 hours at fridge mode at 3 degree in month of july. But looking to its function the consumption is worthful.

Flipkart delivery was good but i had to personally struggle to get it installed although there is nothing much rocket science in it. Refrigerator is very stylish and space is as promised inside . Cooling is very fine and convertible technology is a very handy if you know how to use it well .

Excellent services by flipkart, My rating for the product 10/10 Packing 10/10 - It has inbuilt steblizer, Fresh room available, Delivered within two days , Once product delivered I recommend everyone to call Samsung and initiate request for installation n demo. I GOT IT FOR THE BEST PRICE, NO COST EMI, When compared to outside market I feel it's the best one. Eever one satisfied n happy with this product in my home. Thanks to flipkart team n Samsung team for the support.
For the price of 30000 I paid , it's cheaper than retail price of 33000 and was one of the better fridge in the category. Performing very well
Nice product awesome design performance wise awesome Thank you flipkart for on time delivery

For the family of 3 members this is an ideal choice that I have made. The price of the product in Flipkart was also lesser than any other e-commerce sites. Last but not the least, Flipkart service was really impressive.
I have just bought another home appliance I.e. LG 8kg fully automatic washing machine today. They gave me the best discounted price than any other e-commerce sites in the market. However, I am yet to receive the product. And I hope they will be able impress me again with their impressive service as before.
Thank you Flipkart.

It's good at this price... It's power freezing feature is awesome... and the best part is I got so big vegetable basket and my veggies are fresh till 15-20 days... green like fresh.. maintaining it's cooling is so handy. Getting Convertible Freezer at this price is good and it's working well... for the family of 5-6 it's a must buy.

I am happy with Flipkart delivery and Samsung installation and demo services. The refrigerator is amazing for the discounted price as local retailers were charging a lot more. I was worried about the quality and damages. But everything was fine and I got the fresh room too, which lot of people said they didn't get.
So 5 stars for Flipkart and the team for a good experience. Thank you
no look behind, whatever you want is available in it . and the price under 30 k makes it unique. modal last 5538s8 with fresh room.go fast and make order.

Product is good and good packing. Received in a good condition, big thumbs up to flipkart!! Till now I m not started using it, I will use after 4 days. Samsung technician also well totally value for money. I liked the product.

nice product..you can go for it.
the 5 modes really work well. size is pretty well and build quality also

best in refrigeratosrs as u can control temperature like AC . looks small size even 324l when u see width but it's slim model where u see more height and depth inside which occupies less room space . door design is very cool to clean easy as it's just flat and steel gray color . only due to big vegetable box one bottle try below is missing which may be need to be added reducing vegetable box and put small bottle try . but this is more who need more water and cool drinks . for me but need just want to give hint

Timely delivery by FK with perfect condition and demo by Samsung, after using 8 months my feedback ...

1. Overall excellent product.
2. 5 Conversion and Cool pack features are great.
3. Colour and finishing are elegant.
4. glossy front and leather coated sides are easy to maintain and long lasting.
5. Movable Ice cube box option is very useful, allow extra room for weekend load of fish and meat.
6. Big vegetable box is very useful for large family (but at the cost of a bottle guard).

Only minus - no light in Freezer.

1. excellent delivery by Flipkart. they delivered in two days to my location
2. item is perfectly ok without any scratches or dents
3. installation done in one day after delivery
4. fridge is really good and in Flipkart I got the fridge for 4000/- less than the open market
5.very happy with flipkart

Looks good and trendy in the kitchen. Beautiful design with lots of space inside. The freezer convertible feature is very convenient. The fresh room is also an intelligent addition. Overall a fantastic product. Happy that I chose the brand and the product. And most importantly, excellent service by Flipkart. Was delivered within one day.

Excellent service by Flipkart and courier partner got my order delivered 4 days prior to expected delivery date.
What's more important is that got my refrigerator without any scratch and dent.
The refrigerator is good looking and makes almost negligible noise..
The 5 convertible mode is very handy and the refrigerator spacious is worth for money..

Good Product... Pros: Ample space. Minimal Noice. Easy conversion. Ice cube dispenser. Cool pad. Nice Finish. Looks Premium. Cons: No light in freezer zone. Not adequate leg height. Very bad installation service from Flipkart. Better to install yourself. Don't wait for those scientists!!!
Great product, on time delivery, best deal and discounts, next day installation and demo.. Overall a great price and the best shopping experience. Way to go flipkart!!!!

Right Time Delivery and Samsung Engineer for Demo & Installation, I appreciate to Flipkart for Commitment and follow up. Awesome Price Deal, 5 in 1 & Digital Inverter Technology makes this fridge perfect in more useful in different ways, One can go to buy without any hesitation.
having fresh room, cool pad and all as shown in images

1) First of all Thanks to Flipkart for prompt delivery and same day Installation within 4 hours.
2) Refrigerator is good and specious. It is sufficient for our family of 5.
3) Bottle guard could have been batter. You can not keep big cold drink bottles. Also bottles tend to slip and fall down while opening and closing the door.
4) It has 2 eggs guards which actually I don't need.

Rest everything is owesome.
5 star no problem for any high priced item always buy from flipkart
Good product

I bought the product first time from Flipcart and this is a pain. The reason I have written this review is that I dont want other to go through same pain.

I got a faulty product and it was replaced two times still it was faulty.

The Samsung company engineer was very co-operating and he have given feedback to Flipkart as well.

The call center experience was pathetic and finally I have to use the faulty product.

Superb service and superb product...and price is too low compare to market showroom

Refrigerator is awesome.. super performance..reason for rating 4 is the capacity of the refrigerator. Samsung has given a huge space for freezer. Compared to other refrigerators it has a only 3racks to store but should have given an additional rack reducing the freezer space. Also should have given additional rack for water bottles too. These are the two things i have noticed.
Nice Product but Flipkart Exchange needs to be update for Refrigerator.

within 6 months of ordering this product, front panel display is damaged and needs replacement. no support from samsung as usual spares are not available. because of this display, the whole fridge is not working. now samsung says there will be scrarches all over the fridge while replacing this display if it ever arrives. This is the worst design and poor service from samsung. PLEASE DONT GO FOR THIS PRODUCT!!!!

Overall i am happy with flipkart service.
Delivery was excellent. But the installation person who was sent By SAMSUNG was inexperienced. But that's not Flipkart's fault, That's Samsung's fault, he broke my icebox.
Good for the small family. Only con I found in this refrigerator is that water drip tray is not available because of that water gets accumulated under the compressor
VALUE FOR MONEY, Excellent

Product is good and as expected large capacity, but bottle tray is very small and for large bottle. Outside look is very good. Performance is also best. only internal design is not that much good. Overall the product is good. 1 star less for internal design.
